availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: U.S. Army unit stationed at Fort Bragg, California, from January 1861 to April 1861. Stationed in Washington, D.C., from October 1861 to January 1862. Attached to the Army of the Potomac from January 1862 to June 1863. Attached to the 5th Army Corps from June 1863 to August 1863. Assigned to the Department of the East from August 1863 to May 1865. Assigned to the Department of the South from May 1865 to October 1865.

ab.bibl:
Frederick Dyer, A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion (Des Moines: The Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), 1711.
KYR-0001-019-0005.
